input.sentences: after i finished my shopping i got on the subway and went home .
it was a really fun ride .
after i got off i still had to walk home .
thankfully i got home just in time .
output.sentences: After a long day of shopping the woman took the Subway home.
She enjoyed the ride and had fun looking out the window.
Once she got to her stop she had to walk home.
It started raining really hard when she was almost home.
Thankfully she was able to run the rest of the way and get home mostly dry.
